extendedInfo.description: Awaken Alarm Clock Free is the lite version of Awaken Alarm Clock, which is based off the system alarm clock for maximum reliability, while adding a ton of great extra features to help you get up in the morning! Features include music files as alarm sound, shake to snooze, gradually increasing volume, and more! You can create and save as many alarms as you wish, and turn them on and off as desired.More details about the features of Awaken Alarm Clock Free:* use music, mp3 files, or recorded voice notes as alarms, in addition to the system ringtones* shake to snooze - snooze the alarm when you shake your phone* gradually increasing volume gives you the chance to dismiss the alarm before it becomes loud* name your alarms, allowing them to serve as reminders* alarms can repeat on certain days* vibrating alarms* timeout alarms so they don't keep playing all dayUpgrade to Awaken Alarm Clock to get:* no advertisements! a free, ad supported app, Awaken Alarm Clock Free, is available with a limited feature set* text SMS a number if you don't dismiss the alarm within a given amount of time. use to let your roommate know you need to be woken up, to inform your early-morning meeting that you'll be running late, and more!* call a number either immediately or if the alarm is not dismissed. call your home phone to wake you up if your Android phone isn't loud enough, or phone a friend!* require that you solve a challenge test before you can snooze or dismiss the alarm. challenges include typing, math, and color pickingTry out Awaken Alarm Clock free plus if you like it, you can buy the full version to add lots of features, remove the ads, and support the developer!

reviews.title: Bate and switch, used to be good
reviews.comment: This says its a free version.  But, to have repeating alarms you have to pay, and they say its $2. But when you press that button then it says it\'s $4.
reviews.author: Rob greene

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work.
reviews.comment: Gradual alarm starts too loud on Samsung Epic 4G on EL30.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy and reliable!
reviews.comment: Best alarm app. So easy to set. Has never failed me. Can wake to a song on my playlist. Volume gradually increases. Excellent alarm app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is the only thing that can get my outta bed and the shake to snooze is awesome five stars well done
reviews.author: Connor Dubash

reviews.comment: Works fine as advertised, a suggestion would be to map the power button to dismiss/snooze, as there is no camera button on the HTC Desire for instance
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BEST ALARM CLOCK PERIOD 5*
reviews.comment: Lg esteem/revolution metropcs. FIVE STARS. AND IF they add more / better ringtones***** I WILL BUY IN A HEARTBEAT. I reccomend this to all family and friends. Dont change a thing just more/variety/LOUDER ringtones. I LOVE THIS ALARM. MY RIGHT HAND MAN ALARMCLOCK. Please take my advice about ringtone update and i will buy and so will my wife. Thank you so much for a great app. Its greatly appreciated! TEN STARS FOR REALZ!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It stole my clock
reviews.comment: It works great but, It deleted my original clock app/widget that came on the phone! Wtf someone help me get it back!  HTC Incredible 2

reviews.comment: Easy to use alarm. I like the \"time out\" feature. I have alarms set 3x/day to remind me to take my meds.

reviews.title: IT is just silence
reviews.comment: The alarm starts, but it\'s silent. I had an mp3 selected as the alarm sound.

reviews.title: Volume Bug
reviews.comment: No matter I set it for, it would change all alarm volumes to 50% every day. Other than that it has nice features but nothing worth keeping it for when the alarm wasn\'t loud enough to wake.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: The alarm only sounds half of the time!

reviews.comment: Very Helpfull definatley recommended and its free so even if for some reason you dont like you can get rid of it without wasting money

reviews.title: Still worthless
reviews.comment: I use audio manager to silent everything on my phone and this alarm does not have sound when I have play in silent on and 100% sound

reviews.comment: fail to start,i got late to work few times

reviews.comment: Nothing special, easier to stick with the one already on my phone. Htc hero.

reviews.comment: So nice to be able to set an alarm that doesn\'t make me want to blow my brains out!
